summary: A Simple recolor of the blue robes to Crimson and Charcoal.
descriptionHtml:
This is an alternative color for the \'Blue Robes\' (Item 000a199b).

The robes and hood have been recolored a deep red with charcoal highlights. I have also drastically darkened the rope belt and trimmings. 

Very little has been changed aside from the color. They are in original resolution. I cleaned up the stitching a tiny bit, and made the seams line up a bit better. The are a bit sharper than my screenshots.

This is the first attempt I\'ve made to do anything at all with a PC and imaging, and my first released game mod. I hope it doesn\'t pale too much in comparision to the many high quality mods available here. 

I use Realistic Lighting Without Post-Processing by 747823 and Pluto > http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4323
However I did recolor this to look as best as possible with and without the lighting mod.

In the future, I plan to clean up the texture more possibly add more color combinations and perhaps create an HD version. 

All credit goes to bethesda here. Like I said, I just painted the roses red.
author: CxJxF
